availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Sellers (Mason County, Kentucky, miller and private (USA))

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, miller and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Mains Sellers in Bracken County on February 28, 1848. Father of James P. Sellers, Sarah J. Sellers, Martha Sellers, William H. Sellers, and Frances Sellers. Married to Mary Ellen Sellers Sellers in Bracken County on November 10, 1865. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850. Miller in Mason County in 1860. Served in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from September 1, 1864, to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 550.
